select
tran.id, tran.name, user.name as owner, customer.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, tran.source, contacts.fullname as contactsId
from tbl_tran as tran join tbl_user as user on tran.owner = user.id left join tbl_customer as customer on tran.customerId=customer.id left join tbl_contacts as contacts on tran.contactsId=contacts.id
user.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and tran.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and customer.name like '%' #{customer} '%'
and tran.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and tran.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and tran.sourcee like '%' #{source} '%'
and contacts.fullname like '%' #{contact} '%'
limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}
